info: The standard markup language every web developer must know to create the base of a webpage.
Flex, grid, margin, padding, borders; These are some properties that I always use to design, layout, and present webpages.
Experienced with ES6+ features. I spend most of my coding time developing dynamic web applications using JavaScript.
A powerful front-end JavaScript library that I use to build modular, reusable components. This website itself was built with React.
Used primarily with React, TypeScript helps enforce static typing, reducing runtime errors and improving code maintainability.
A utility-first framework that speeds up styling. While I often prefer vanilla CSS, I recognize Tailwind's advantages for large-scale projects.
As JavaScript is my programming language of choice, I use Node.js for building back-end applications with JavaScript outside the browser.
A minimalist Node.js framework I use to handle routing, middleware, and API endpoints in web applications.
A useful middleware for Node.js which allows me to easily implement user authentication strategies such as JWTs.
A powerful API testing tool that allows me to send and debug HTTP requests efficiently.
A templating engine for dynamically generating HTML on the server-side, often used in full-stack applications.
A robust, open-source relational database that I use to structure and manage data efficiently.
A type-safe ORM that integrates well with PostgreSQL, allowing me to manage databases using an OOP approach.
Proficient in writing SQL queries for CRUD operations before transitioning to using ORMs like Prisma.
Version control system for tracking changes in my projects, working seamlessly with GitHub.
A platform I use to manage repositories, collaborate with others, and deploy projects.
My go-to IDE for all web-development programming. I try to keep extensions to a minimal for a lightweight, clean experience.
Used to install packages in virtually all my projects including some tools you see here.
My go-to build tool for React projects, offering fast local development and optimized production builds.
Primarily used for bundling JavaScript modules and setting up efficient development workflows.
Comfortable with basic CLI commands and currently use Ubuntu as my main OS for development.
Implemented test-driven development in some projects by writing unit tests before writing production code.
Ensuring web applications work seamlessly across various screen sizes while considering web accessibility.
Proficient with typical Microsoft Office software applications (i.e., Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Teams, Sharepoint, Access, etc.).
